/* * A field element is encoded as four 64-bit integers, in basis 2^63. * Operations return partially reduced values, which may range up to * 2^255+37. */

function.name: f255_add
f255_sub
f255_mul
f255_mul_a24
f255_final_reduce
api_mul
function.parameter_list: (unsigned char *G, size_t Glen, const unsigned char *kb, size_t kblen, int curve)

function.name: api_mulgen
function.parameter_list: (unsigned char *R, const unsigned char *x, size_t xlen, int curve)

function.name: api_muladd
